Omek Beckon SDK 2.4

Class List
Here are the classes, structs, unions and interfaces with brief descriptions:
Omek::GestureInfoStructure containing gesture info found in classifier xml file
Omek::IAlertListenerInterface for alerts callbacks
Omek::IClassifierInterface for a gesture classifier functionality
Omek::IClassifierParamsInterface for classifier parameters. This interface gives access to a classifier XML file. The classifier XML file defines the tracking data format, joints that are of interest, the number of frames, scaling options, etc
Omek::IFiredEventObject interface that event listeners
Omek::IGestureListenerInterface for gesture events callbacks
Omek::IMotionSensorThis class is the main interface for the Omek Beckon SDK
Omek::ISensorServes as both an interface to a connected 3D depth sensor, as well as a virtual camera simulating a real camera by using a specified sequence
Omek::ISkeletonServes as an interface to the Skeleton class which is a data structure containing the tracked rotation and translation data, as well as the bounding region for each joint
Omek::JointInfoStructure containing joint info found in classifier xml file
